name: Aof United
startIntroPart1: You and Aus Denman unite like Aof West and Aof East unite. Today make a great thing for Aof United. President!
startIntroPart2: President, your people call you to bring good society to the country. Will you make a civilization that can which is acceptable to society?
introduction: I am Aus Denman, President of Aof United. We'll treat you with honor and respect, if you do the same.
declaringWar: I'am declaring war to you. maybe you have a bad reputation.
attacked: What do you want if you declare war? Well then... then you looked for it.
defeated: This is unfortunate, after all, you are the victor.
hateHello: You want to cause trouble again?!
hateLetsHearIt: You better have a good offer...
hateNo: How could you think I would accept that!?
afterPeace: Ok. war is over. Now peaceful.
tradeRequest: Hello. we trading with good trade. economy and society
uniques: [+60]% Production when constructing [Gunpowder] units [in your cities] <during a Golden Age>
[-30]% unhappiness from the number of cities <during a Golden Age>
